Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Being able to ask specific questions according to my developing understanding is a good but ultimately insufficient compensation for the cardinal sin of tertiary education - namely the focus on lectures over tutoring.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: When GenAI doesn't understand what I'm asking and gives me a pat answer, I only question the ~$30/month premium subscription price. When the same thing happens with a teacher, I question a much larger investment and feel proportionally worse.
